greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference between 3^n and the next larger power of 2.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
program: (PARI) { default(realprecision, 50); t=1/log(2); for (n=0, 200, write("b063003.txt", n, " ", 2^ceil(t*log(3^n)) - 3^n) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 15 2009
results.author: _Jens Voß_, Jul 02 2001
